CTRL+Right Click to highlight the connected blocks!

itemdesc-storagelinker-*: Device to link containers to a controller. Left Click on controller first. Then Left Click on containers to link them to that controller. Shift+Left Click to unlink the container from the controller.
itemdesc-storagecontrollerupgrade-*: Upgrades a lower tier storage controller to a higher one. Right click on a placed storage controller to use. Any items in the controller will be dropped, but the controller will remember the containers it is linked to. (You can't upgrade between bronze types)'
gui-hover-clear-all: Disconnect all linked containers from the controller.
gui-hover-link-all: Connect all containers within range to the controller.
gui-hover-highlight: Highlight linked containers and their range for easy identification.
gui-hover-searchbar: Search for items/blocks by name or use keywords (example: oak to find oak-related items, silver to find items related to silver)
helditem-error-linker {0}: Use the {0} on storage controller first
